<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update conversation"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/admin/api/conversations/{conversationId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Requires permission **ConversationUpdate**. Updates conversation details such as tags.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Conversation ID","in":"path","name":"conversationId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}},"description":"Conversation update request","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
